com.microsoft.azure.gateway.core

Class GatewayModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.gateway.core.GatewayModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGatewayModule

    public abstract class GatewayModule
extends Object
implements IGatewayModule
    The Abstract GatewayModule class to be extended by the module-creator when creating any modules.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GatewayModule

        public GatewayModule(long address,
                     Broker broker,
                     String configuration)
        Constructs a GatewayModule from the provided address and Broker. A GatewayModule should always call this super constructor before any module-specific constructor code. The address parameter must be passed to the super constructor but can be ignored by the module-implementor when writing a module implementation.
        Parameters:
        address - The address of the native module pointer.
        broker - The Broker to which this module belongs
        configuration - The module-specific configuration

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public abstract void receive(Message message)

      • destroy

        public abstract void destroy()
        Description copied from interface: IGatewayModule
        The destroy method is called on a GatewayModule before it is about to be "destroyed" and removed from the gateway. Once a module is removed from the gateway, it may no longer send or receive messages. The destroy() and receive() methods are guaranteed to not be called simultaneously.
        Specified by:
        destroy in interface IGatewayModule

      • create

        public void create(long moduleAddr,
                   Broker broker,
                   String configuration)
        Description copied from interface: IGatewayModule
        The create method is called when the native Gateway creates the Module.
        Specified by:
        create in interface IGatewayModule
        Parameters:
        moduleAddr - The address of the native module pointer
        broker - The Broker to which this module belongs
        configuration - The configuration for this module represented as a JSON string

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: IGatewayModule
        The start method is called when the native Gateway has created all modules to notify each module that it is safe to start sending messages. This method is optional, but it is recommended that any long-running processes get started in this method.
        Specified by:
        start in interface IGatewayModule

      • receive

        public void receive(byte[] serializedMessage)
        Description copied from interface: IGatewayModule
        The receive method is called on a GatewayModule whenever it receives a message. The destroy() and receive() methods are guaranteed to not be called simultaneously.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface IGatewayModule
        Parameters:
        serializedMessage - The serialized message

      • publish

        public int publish(Message message)
            throws IOException
        Publishes the Message to the Broker.
        Parameters:
        message - The Message to be published
        Returns:
        0 on success, non-zero otherwise. See Message broker documentation.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the Message cannot be serialized.

        Gets the JSON configuration string for this GatewayModule
